name: Person
description:
This game is made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2021.  Theme was Lost & Found.

Sometimes we lose our eraser, we search and find. Sometimes we lose a loved one, we can't bring it back. If we lose our personality can we bring it back?

 Person is first person adventure game.

GGJ link:  https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/person-5

Design & Develop: Taha Erel

Voice: Ugur Pekpazar
